attributes.action: Use a voting system that allows electors to vote against individual candidates as well as for them, and allocates seats using a fair system of proportional representation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The system of proportional representation used must ensure that the voters choose the individual candidates who get elected and not the political parties. So the favoured candidates of the main parties, their leaders for instance, are not guaranteed seats in Parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
